front.title: IETF ICANN Protocol Support Organization Appointments Procedures

abstract.t: This document specifies the process by which the IETF appoints its 2 representatives to ICANN's Protocol Support Organization's Protocol Council (PSO-PC). Additionally, the process for selecting candidates for the PSO's appointments to the ICANN Board of Directors is specified. This process specification reflects 2 years of IETF experience with ICANN, the PSO-PC and the PSO organization, since their inception in 1999.
